column4: if you type ctrl - alt - F11 once you think it's loaded you can get terminal access
it just gets to a screen when where there is like 3 copies of the loading logo and status bar spread out smaller than usual and some weird symbols on the top (chinese?)
what would i do once i got to terminal anyway
sounds a bit weird for me, it's just a workaround that can be useful if you know what to delete/reset via command line. Sorry
